name: BLENDVERSE DECENTRALIZED FINANCE
about: BLEN is the next generation of Decentralized Finance, SIMPLIFIED, powered by POLYGON Chain. BLEN leverages innovations, brought to the market by first generation DeFi projects and integrates emerging technologies to enhance, yield optimization in a simple yet efficient manner. BLEN simplifies staking with the most liquid POLYGON Chain Liquidity Pools available and provides a robust yield earning environment on the market while adapting to daily liquidity needs of different pools. BLEN is Decentralized Finance, Simplified!
